languages.text: "Злой дух. Он напал со спины и сразу ранил меня". {n}Ульфар указывает на особо жуткий рубец на груди — удар был нацелен в одно из двух сердец Астартес. От раны едко пахнет неведомым вам лекарством — скорее всего, фенрисийским бальзамом, сваренным самим Ульфаром. Ваши лекари попадали бы в обморок от одного запаха подобного снадобья.{/n}

"An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Злой дух. Он напал со спины и сразу ранил меня". {n}Ульфар указывает на особо жуткий рубец на груди — удар был нацелен в одно из двух сердец Астартес. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

languages.text: “是只恶灵。它从背后袭击了我，那一击就让我受了重伤。”{n}乌尔法指着胸前那道极其可怕的伤疤。很显然，当时敌人那一击的目标，就是太空野狼两颗心脏的其中一颗。他的伤口散发着浓烈的药味，但你并没闻过这样的味道，这很可能是乌尔法自己酿造的芬里斯药膏。若是你的治疗师闻到了这种味道，恐怕会被当场熏晕过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是只恶灵。它从背后袭击了我，那一击就让我受了重伤。”{n}乌尔法指着胸前那道极其可怕的伤疤。很显然，当时敌人那一击的目标，就是太空野狼两颗心脏的其中一颗。他的伤口散发着浓烈的药味，但你并没闻过这样的味道，这很可能是乌尔法自己酿造的芬里斯药膏。若是你的治疗师闻到了这种味道，恐怕会被当场熏晕过去。{/n}

languages.text: 「邪悪な精霊だ。背後から俺を攻撃してきた、それであっという間に傷を負ったんだ」{n}ウルファーは特に凄惨な胸の傷を指さす。その一撃はスペースウルフの2個の心臓の内ひとつを明らかに狙っていた。傷からは薬の臭いが強く漂っているが、知っている臭いではない――おそらく、ウルファーが自分で煎じたフェンリスの軟膏だ。治療師がこんな薬の香りを一嗅ぎすれば気を失うだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「邪悪な精霊だ。背後から俺を攻撃してきた、それであっという間に傷を負ったんだ」{n}ウルファーは特に凄惨な胸の傷を指さす。その一撃はスペースウルフの2個の心臓の内ひとつを明らかに狙っていた。傷からは薬の臭いが強く漂っているが、知っている臭いではない――おそらく、ウルファーが自分で煎じたフェンリスの軟膏だ。治療師がこんな薬の香りを一嗅ぎすれば気を失うだろう。{/n}

languages.text: «Un espíritu maligno. Me atacó a traición y me hirió al momento». {n}Ulfar señala una cicatriz especialmente espantosa en su pecho, dirigida contra uno de los corazones del Lobo Espacial. La herida desprende un potente olor a medicina, aunque no lo reconoces. Probablemente sea un bálsamo fenrisiano elaborado por el propio Ulfar. Tus sanadores se desmayarían al oler la pócima.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un espíritu maligno. Me atacó a traición y me hirió al momento». {n}Ulfar señala una cicatriz especialmente espantosa en su pecho, dirigida contra uno de los corazones del Lobo Espacial. La herida desprende un potente olor a medicina, aunque no lo reconoces. Probablemente sea un bálsamo fenrisiano elaborado por el propio Ulfar. Tus sanadores se desmayarían al oler la pócima.{/n}

languages.text: « Un esprit malfaisant. Il m'a attaqué par-derrière et m'a blessé sur le coup. » {n}Ulfar désigne une cicatrice effroyable sur sa poitrine ; le coup visait clairement l'un des deux cœurs du Space Wolf. Il s'en dégage une puissante odeur médicinale que vous ne reconnaissez pas, probablement un baume fenrissien préparé par Ulfar lui-même et dont la moindre bouffée ferait perdre connaissance à vos guérisseurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un esprit malfaisant. Il m'a attaqué par-derrière et m'a blessé sur le coup. » {n}Ulfar désigne une cicatrice effroyable sur sa poitrine ; le coup visait clairement l'un des deux cœurs du Space Wolf. Il s'en dégage une puissante odeur médicinale que vous ne reconnaissez pas, probablement un baume fenrissien préparé par Ulfar lui-même et dont la moindre bouffée ferait perdre connaissance à vos guérisseurs.{/n}

languages.text: "Ein böser Geist. Er griff mich von hinten an und verwundete mich sofort." {n}Ulfar deutet auf eine besonders üble Narbe auf seiner Brust. Der Schlag sollte offensichtlich eines der beiden Herzen des Space Wolf treffen. Die Wunde sondert einen starken medizinischen Geruch ab, den du aber nicht kennst – wahrscheinlich ein von Ulfar selbst hergestellter Fenris-Balsam. Röchen deine Heiler auch nur kurz daran, würden sie vermutlich bewusstlos umfallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "An evil spirit. It attacked me from behind and wounded me instantly." {n}Ulfar points to a particularly gruesome scar on his chest, the strike clearly intended for one of the Space Wolf's two hearts. The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein böser Geist. Er griff mich von hinten an und verwundete mich sofort." {n}Ulfar deutet auf eine besonders üble Narbe auf seiner Brust. Der Schlag sollte offensichtlich eines der beiden Herzen des Space Wolf treffen. Die Wunde sondert einen starken medizinischen Geruch ab, den du aber nicht kennst – wahrscheinlich ein von Ulfar selbst hergestellter Fenris-Balsam. Röchen deine Heiler auch nur kurz daran, würden sie vermutlich bewusstlos umfallen.{/n}

languages.text: "Kötü bir ruh. Bana arkamdan saldırdı ve anında yaraladı." {n}Ulfar, göğsündeki çok kötü hâldeki yaraya işaret ediyor, saldırırken Uzay Kurdu'nun iki kalbini hedeflediği çok bariz. Yaradan yoğun bir ilaç kokusu geliyor ama hangisi olduğunu çıkaramıyorsun. Muhtemelen Ulfar'ın yaptığı bir Fenris balsamıdır. Senin şifacıların bu iksirin kokusunu aldığı anda bayılırdı.{/n}

The wound gives off a strong medicinal smell, but it is not one you recognise — probably a Fenrisian balm brewed by Ulfar himself. Your healers would faint after one whiff of such a potion.{/n}
